hero.subtitle: Prague-based studio helping teams ship great games, from gameplay to console ports.

about.title: Hard Problems, Solved
about.description1: We're a Prague-based development team that tackles the tough stuff: gameplay systems, performance optimization, rendering pipelines, and porting to PlayStation, Xbox, Switch, and handhelds.
about.description2: Studios call us when they need complex technical challenges solved and shipped on time.

focus.title: Technical Excellence
focus.subtitle: We obsess over performance and polish.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: A focused team built to ship ambitious games across platforms fast.

engineering.title: Engineering
engineering.body: We work hands-on with Unreal, Unity, and Godot, and are comfortable with proprietary engines built in C/C++ and Rust. We focus on clean, stable systems and performance that holds up in production.

porting.title: Porting
porting.body: We ship to Xbox One, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and VR platforms like Meta Quest. We handle platform specifics carefully so gameplay, performance, and certification stay on track.

qa.title: In-House QA
qa.body: Our QA team works alongside engineers to validate changes quickly and reduce turnaround time. They also run platform compliance checks on each build to keep releases safe and predictable.

release.title: Release Management
release.body: We set up titles, fine-tune profiles, and move builds through the full pipeline to production. The process is structured, repeatable, and easy to follow for partners.

backend.title: Backend and Cloud
backend.body: We build APIs and backend services on AWS and Azure using modern, production-ready stacks. Reliability, observability, and maintainability guide how we ship and operate.

ai.title: AI
ai.body: We develop and train in-house models to support teams across every development step, from prototyping to polish. The goal is practical acceleration, not hype.

projects.title: Our Work
projects.subtitle: Proud to be part of these amazing projects.

contact.title: Got a Project in Mind?
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear about it. Drop us a line and let's see what we can build together.
